Established in 2022, Tejas Manufacture is a fast-growing manufacturer of advanced
industrial equipment. We deliver robust, reliable, and efficient engineering solutions to
support your business.

PRODUCTS

Comprehensive Industrial Equipment

Each product is crafted with high-grade materials, tested for performance, and designed for long-term use.

  • Dust Collectors

    Breathe Easier with Our Dust Collectors

    Effectively capture dust and particles, keeping your air clean and workplace healthy.

  • Bucket Elevator

    Lift Your Materials Higher, Effortlessly

    Perfect for lifting bulk materials vertically with high capacity and gentle handling.

  • Conveyors

    Move Materials Smoothly and Efficiently

    Transport materials around your facility, saving time and effort.

  • Industrial Blowers

    Powerful Airflow for Your Needs

    Move air efficiently for ventilation, material transport, and more with steady performance.

  • Slide Gates

    Control Material Flow with Ease

    Precisely control bulk material movement with durable and easy-to-operate gates.

  • Industrial Mixers

    Efficient Blending for Your Materials

    Blend various materials thoroughly and efficiently with uniform consistency.

  • Material Hoppers

    Smart Storage for Smooth Flow

    Designed for storing and releasing bulk materials efficiently with durable, custom-built industrial solutions.

  • Industrial Ducting

    The Right Path for Air and Materials

    High-quality ducting systems that guide air, fumes, and materials exactly where they need to go.

  • Spares & Components

    Keep Your Operations Running Smoothly

    Full range of high-quality spare parts and components to minimize downtime and extend machinery life.
